mapper.select: select l.code,l.lost_date,l.kind,l.item,l.info,p.placeid,p.depplace,p.addr,p.tel,l.photo,p.x,p.y from p_lost l, p_place p where p.placeid=l.placeid and p.placeid=#{placeid}
select l.photo, l.state, l.code,l.lost_date,l.kind,l.item,l.info,p.depplace,p.addr,p.tel,p.x,p.y from s_lost l, s_place p where p.tel=l.tel and p.tel=#{tel}
select * from s_lost l, s_place p where p.tel=l.tel and code=#{code}
SELECT * FROM p_lost where rownum < 4 order by lost_date asc
